abstract: A top Republican lawmaker has opened an inquiry into a doctor whom the Army has accused of falsifying a study involving a product made by a company for whom he works as a paid consultant.
snippet: A top Republican lawmaker has opened an inquiry into a doctor whom the Army has accused of falsifying a study involving a product made by a company for whom he works as a paid consultant.
lead_paragraph: A top Republican lawmaker has opened an inquiry into a former Walter Reed Army Medical Center doctor whom the Army has accused of falsifying a medical study involving a product made by Medtronic, a company for whom he works as a paid consultant.

headline.main: Senator Seeks Data on Doctor Accused by Army of Falsifying a Product Study
headline.print_headline: Senator Seeks Data on Doctor Accused by Army of Falsifying a Product Study

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

byline.original: By Barry Meier and Duff Wilson
